text: Dimaadua ga helekai, “Dogu daamada ne gida Israel, e hai be dagu gida nia golee ‘grape’ e tomo i hongo di anggowaa. Dogu daamada ne mmada gi godou maadua mmaadua, e hai be dagu mmada gi di laagau ‘fig’ ne leu matagidagi. Di nadau loomoi gi di Gonduu Peor,9.10 Numbers 25.1-5 digaula gu daamada gu daumaha gi di god huaidu go Baal, gu limalima hua gu gulugulua be nia god ala e aloho ai ginaadou.
